stories.story: As a User, I want search to be fast, so that I can find results without waiting

component.ends: I can find results without waiting

detected_violations.issue: 'search is fast' is not a concrete action on a clear object and is vague
detected_violations.suggestion: Narrow the Means to a single clear capability, e.g., 'perform a search query'

detected_violations.issue: 'I can find results without waiting' implies the same functionality as Means and doesn't introduce a new feature but still doesn't help in making the story estimatable
detected_violations.suggestion: Remove or rephrase Ends to avoid redundancy and ensure it doesn't expand the scope

stories.story: As an Analyst, I want to export data, so that I can run reports

detected_violations.issue: The capability 'export data' is coarse-grained and could involve multiple materially different implementations (e.g., exporting to different formats, handling various data types).
detected_violations.suggestion: Narrow the 'Means' to a single clear capability, such as 'export data to CSV'.

detected_violations.issue: 'I can run reports' implies additional functionality beyond 'export data' and expands the scope.
detected_violations.suggestion: Make 'I can run reports' its own user story.

stories.story: As a Support Agent, I want to view a customer profile, so that I can resolve issues

detected_violations.issue: The [Ends] 'I can resolve issues' is too broad and implies additional functionality beyond just viewing a customer profile.
detected_violations.suggestion: Make 'resolving issues' a separate user story.

stories.story: As a Shopper, I want to see product recommendations, so that I can find items faster

detected_violations.issue: The capability 'see product recommendations' is not bounded to a concrete action on a clear object.
detected_violations.suggestion: Narrow the Means to a single clear capability, e.g., 'see product recommendations on the product details page'.

detected_violations.issue: 'I can find items faster' subtly implies extra functionality beyond just seeing product recommendations.
detected_violations.suggestion: Make 'I can find items faster' its own user story or rephrase [Ends] to directly relate to the means.

stories.story: As an Admin, I want to manage users, so that access stays accurate

detected_violations.issue: 'manage users' is too coarse-grained and could imply multiple different actions
detected_violations.suggestion: Narrow the Means to a single clear capability, e.g., 'add users', 'remove users', or 'edit user roles'

detected_violations.issue: 'access stays accurate' implies additional functionality or validation that is not explicitly defined
detected_violations.suggestion: Make any scope-expanding Ends their own user stories, e.g., 'As an Admin, I want to validate user access permissions after managing users so that access stays accurate'

stories.story: As a Customer, I want to download my purchase history for a selected month as CSV (UTF-8, comma, header) including order_id, date, total, up to 5000 rows, so that I can review my expenses

component.means: download my purchase history for a selected month as CSV (UTF-8, comma, header) including order_id, date, total, up to 5000 rows

stories.story: As a Librarian, I want to search books by title or author with pagination (limit, offset) returning title, author, call_number, so that I can help patrons at the desk

component.means: search books by title or author with pagination (limit, offset) returning title, author, call_number
component.ends: I can help patrons at the desk

stories.story: As a Driver, I want to receive a low-fuel alert when fuel < 10% via in-app banner no more than once per hour using existing telemetry, so that I can refill before running out

component.means: receive a low-fuel alert when fuel < 10% via in-app banner no more than once per hour using existing telemetry
component.ends: I can refill before running out
